name: Simple White X - Pante custom
description: Personal customization for Simple White X theme
additional_info:
Require 'Simple White X' theme - https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/simplewhitex/ Compatible with light themes - https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/personaswitcher/
This is a (dirty) customization based in differents other styles. It isn't finished. Do not use with Firefox default theme. It is, just, terrible...
